name: AbD Serotec
tag_list: antibody, antibody-manufacturer, antibody-supplier, antigens, peptides, reagents, biotechnology, custom-antibodies
overview:
AbD Serotec, a division of MorphoSys, is one of the world’s leading antibody manufacturers supplying over 15,000 antibodies, kits and accessories.

We pride ourselves on providing great customer support for all the products and services we supply so please contact us with any questions on their use or the results you can expect. We can even help source products not currently available or develop them to your specification using our custom services team.

AbD Serotec has an ISO 9001 and ISO 13485 certified production facility in Kidlington, near Oxford, UK. This facility is AbD Serotec’s global headquarters, and supports our other centers in Raleigh, North Carolina and Dusseldorf, Germany. Our unique HuCAL® custom monoclonal generation services are performed at our ISO 9001 certified R&D laboratories in Puchheim, near Munich in Germany.
